item.title: ::item full spawn command for players
item.dc:creator: @Deify Deify
item.description:
@Deify wrote:

if (command.startsWith("pickup")) { String[] args = command.split(" "); int id = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); int amt = Integer.parseInt(args[2]); if(args.length < 4) { try { if(id == 1048 || id == 1046 || id == 1044 || id == 1042 || id == 1039 || id == 1041 || id == 1043 || id == 1045 || id == 1040 || id == 1047 || id == 1049 || id == 1050 || id == 1051 || id == 1053 || id == 1054 || id == 1055 || id == 1056 || id == 1057 || id == 1058 || id == 1037 || id == 962 || id == 963 || id == 1038 || id == 2528 || id == 6529 || id == 4067) { sendMessage("You can't spawn this item! "); } else { addItem(id, amt); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Remember, item ID must be 5 digits, add 0's!"); } } }]

just make it usable for everyone.??

Read full topic
